description: Adds `clientConfig` as an optional parameter to the `CognitoIdentityCredentials` constructor. This parameter can be used to pass in client configuration to the underlying service clients.
Allows passing of master credentials to the TemporaryCredentials provider.
Added new API to list the different files between 2 commits
Amazon ECS now supports a state for container instances that can be used to drain a container instance in preparation for maintenance or cluster scale down.
